text:
MoveWith | San Francisco, CA | Backend Engineer

We're looking for a backend engineer to reimagine fitness and wellness with us. Your primary focus will be development of all server-side logic, definition and maintenance of our database solutions, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from front-end clients (mobile and web). Our ideal candidate is experienced at turning product requirements into real, effective, and maintainable solutions while balancing tight deadlines.

We have work from home Wednesdays, waffles on Thursdays, and a fun active team of good humans.

More info and application here: https://angel.co/movewith/jobs/89343-backend-engineer
